key.name: first-start
key.summary: Indicates if gxsm was ever started on this account
key.description: If true gxsm assumes to be starting first time. It may present initial user guidiances and configurations druids.

key.name: first-start-key
key.description: First start initialization test key.

key.name: splash
key.description: Used to determine if the splash is to be displayed.

key.name: splash-timeout
key.description: The duration the splash is displayed.

key.name: splash-message
key.description: This extra message is displayed along with the default Gxsm Version information at startup in the splash window.

key.name: splash-message-font
key.description: Pango Font to be used for the message layout.

key.name: scan-update-interval
key.summary: scan image update interval in ms
key.description: used in spm_scancontrol: image update rate while scanning.

key.name: hwi-count
key.summary: Indicates the number of found HwI plugins
key.description: HwI count Indicates the number of found HwI plugins -- do not alter, managed internally.

key.name: hwi-list
key.summary: List of loaded HwI interfaces, full class name identifier
key.description: List of full class names of found HwI plugins -- do not alter, managed internally.

key.name: auto-save
key.summary: Indicates data should be auto-saved when a scan is finished
key.description: Auto Save: Indicates data should be auto-saved when a scan is finished

key.name: auto-save-basename
key.description: Auto save base file name. Channel/Mode ID and Counter or timestamp is added as configured.

key.name: auto-save-counter
key.description: Auto save counter value.

key.name: auto-save-folder
key.description: Path to auto save folder. General path base setting.

key.name: auto-save-folder-netcdf
key.summary: Path to auto save folder for netcdf (.nc)
key.description: Path to auto save folder for netcdf scan data files.

key.name: auto-save-folder-probe
key.summary: Path to auto save folder for probe (.vpdata)
key.description: Path to auto save folder for probe (.vpdata) data files.

key.name: user-info-comment
key.description: Comment text. Any additional scan data information manually to be entered.

key.name: auto-restore
key.description: Do automatically restore default channel setup at startup.

key.name: channel-setup-a
key.description: store A. channel configuraton storage array of (View, Mode, Dir) tupels, ...

key.name: channel-setup-b
key.description: store B. channel configuraton storage array of (View, Mode, Dir) tupels, ...

key.name: channel-setup-c
key.description: store C. channel configuraton storage array of (View, Mode, Dir) tupels, ...

key.name: channel-setup-d
key.description: store Default. channel configuraton storage array of (View, Mode, Dir) tupels, ...

key.name: sidepane-show
key.summary: show/hide scan view information side pane
key.description: true: show side pane, false: hide side pane contains access to full NetCDF scan parameter list, probe/scan events inspection and controls, OSD configurations/object control.

key.name: sidepane-width
key.description: sidepane width memorizing

key.name: view-redline
key.description: true: enable red line (current line profile) view [TDB -- bind to channel id]

key.name: view-cursor-radius
key.description: cursor radius

key.name: view-max-number-events
key.summary: limit # events to show in max radius
key.description: max number of events to show in max radius

key.name: view-arrow-size
key.description: marker arrow size (100 is the default marker size)

key.name: view-nc-raw
key.description: NC raw listing

key.name: osd-enable
key.description: stores OSD info setups

key.name: osd-position
key.description: stores OSD info label positions
